title: Kyojinzoku no Hanayome
synopsis: Kouichi Mizuki ends his high school basketball career on a high note, bringing his team to victory during their final match at nationals. Now free from club activities, he looks forward to spending more time socializing, maybe even finding room for romance. But fate has slightly different plans for him when a magical circle transports Kouichi to Tildant, the land of giants.
characters: ['Bistail, Caius Lao', 'Mizuki, Kouichi', 'Barows, Baro', 'Nall Rosas, Medina', 'Berinal, Beri']
staff: [['Ishigura, Rei', ['Director']], ['Misawa, Ayako', ['Sound Director']], ['Kurosaki, Eiyo', ['Script']], ['Ono, Yuuki', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
